column4: anyone know if there is an autosetup or gui setup for sensors? none of my laptops sensors are found, and its running REALLY hot
Obtain a machine with supported sensors.
Put a # in front of their definition line. Any reason you want to disable gettys though?
i cant use them anyways atm
Do NOT comment them ALL out.
Running anything in X that is redirectly alt-F1 through alt-F6?
HermanDE any more thoughts? im getting close to just reinstalling and reconfiging everything ;/
